name: Earth Exodus
description:
Earth Exodus

An unknown apocalypse has left the Earth an unviable place to live for humanity. Not much was known about the event but the coming apocalypse would be a slow death for much of the planet. This allowed the greatest scientist and engineers in the world to formulate plans for a mass exodus of the planet.

Controls
  • WASD for Movement
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left-click to turn on flashlight
  • Climb ledges and press 'W' to pull yourself up
  • Shift to sprint

A game made for the Lunar New Year Game Jam 2020
